name: Vacuum Boy
description:
Vacuum boy is game where your objective is to clean your dirty world with a vacuum cleaner.

One day an enourmus Dumpster appeared in the sky, and  started to dump trash on a tiny world, wich is now littered with garbage.

  everyone escaped from the planet, all except a little boy.  One day while browsing trough the garbage he found the legendary Vac-Cum 6000, a super power full vacuum cleaner  . with the new found power the boy enbarked in a journey, to save the world.

Avoid Dog haris or they will block the Vacuum cleaner!

P.S. the voice acting is not that good, i made that myself, and my pronounciation is not that good, but i put my maximum effort on it nontheless.
